name: QuickBooks Network Data File
summary: Learn about .ND files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: If the network data file becomes corrupted, you can rename the extension to ".ndold," then open the associated company file. QuickBooks will then create a new network data file.

description: Configuration file used by QuickBooks financial accounting software; allows network access to a QuickBooks company file; created when the company file is opened.
